FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, this instance will display events for this course, instead of the one the course module belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, this instance will only display events for this group.

FIELD.NAME: startdate
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, this instance will show events from this date until enddate, instead of the calculated period.

FIELD.NAME: enddate
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, this instance will show events from startdate until this date, instead of the calculated period.

TABLE.NAME: timetableevents_course
TABLE.COMMENT: Course-level settings to define the display of timetable events.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course these settings apply to

FIELD.NAME: startingtermid
FIELD.COMMENT: The academic term this course starts on, for calculating section dates from.

FIELD.NAME: teachingstartdate
FIELD.COMMENT: An optional date to override the start date of the starting term.

FIELD.NAME: firstsection
FIELD.COMMENT: The first section to display events in. The start date calculated from startingtermid and teachingstartdate will apply to this section.

FIELD.NAME: teachinginverval
FIELD.COMMENT: The interval of time that is added on to each section to calculate the period to display events for in that section.

FIELD.NAME: footertext
FIELD.COMMENT: Additional footer text to display after each timetable events instance in this course.

TABLE.NAME: timetableevents_section
TABLE.COMMENT: Additional metadata for special handling of specific sections.

FIELD.NAME: sectionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the section this record applies to

FIELD.NAME: excluded
FIELD.COMMENT: Should this section be excluded from the timetable sequence? If true, this section will be treated as though no time has passed.

FIELD.NAME: readingweek
FIELD.COMMENT: Should this section be treated as a reading week? If so, it will always be treated as though a single week has passed.

TABLE.NAME: timetableevents_group
TABLE.COMMENT: Start date overrides for specific groups.

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The group these overrides apply to.

FIELD.NAME: startingtermid
FIELD.COMMENT: The academic term this group should take its start date from.

FIELD.NAME: teachingstartdate
FIELD.COMMENT: An optional override of the teaching start date from the selected starting term.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name for this academic year

TABLE.NAME: timetableevents_term
TABLE.COMMENT: Start and end dates for an academic term.

FIELD.NAME: yearid
FIELD.COMMENT: The academic year this term falls in

FIELD.NAME: startdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The start date of this term

FIELD.NAME: enddate
FIELD.COMMENT: The end date of this term.
